tasks.task: Attaching a disc coulter to a tractor's three-point hitch
subtasks: Remove current implement from the three-point hitch
Position disc coulter under the tractor's hitch
Align coulter with the hitch's mounting points
Secure coulter to the hitch using locking pins
Tighten any adjustment screws on the coulter
Check tire pressure on all tractor tires
Look for visible damage to the tractor's frame
Test the functionality of the steering system
Inspect hydraulic fluids for leaks and level
Verify the brakes are functional and not worn

tasks.task: Operating a combine harvester to harvest wheat
subtasks: Position the combine in the field by the headland
Adjust header height to pick up straw and grain correctly
Monitor grain flow and clean seeds as necessary
Change knives or adjustment settings as needed during harvest
Switch direction at the headland using turn conditioning
Set proper depth for seed placement in the soil
Apply accurate seed spacing to ensure proper plant spacing
Monitor seed moisture content and adjust accordingly
Check soil conditions and adjust planter settings if necessary
Load seed into the hopper and check seed flow

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to transport crops
subtasks: Check for obstructions on the road or in the field
Determine the safest path for moving the crops
Operate the steering smoothly to avoid damaging the crops
Use speed appropriate for the terrain and crop type
Check rearview mirrors or turn to check blind spots when moving vehicles
Set appropriate inter-plant spacing for corn rows
Adjust seeding depth according to soil conditions
Monitor downforce settings to maintain consistent planting depth
Check for clean furrows to ensure proper seed placement

tasks.task: Driving a tractor to mow weeds in a soybean field
subtasks: Position the mower blades at the correct height for soybeans
Guide the tractor along the rows, maintaining speed for efficient mowing
Manipulate the steering wheel to follow rows precisely
Inspect mowing results and adjust if necessary, such as raising/lowering blades

tasks.task: Conducting a soil sampling for fertilizer application
subtasks: Select representative areas of the field to sample
Use a soil probe to extract samples from the root zone
Fill sample bags and record location and depth
Send samples to a lab for nutrient analysis
Calculate the required amount of lime based on soil test results
Load lime into a spreader or use a broadcast applicator
Drive through the field, applying lime uniformly
Check coverage and adjust speed or application rate as needed
